tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmployeeComplaints (
  complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  complaint_date DATE NOT NULL,
  complaint_description TEXT,
  investigation_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Investigations (
  investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  complaint_id INT,
  investigator_id INT,
  investigation_notes TEXT,
  investigation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE investigations (
  investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  complaint_id INT,
  investigator_id INT,
  investigation_notes TEXT,
  investigation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE investigations (
  investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  complaint_id INT,
  investigator_id INT,
  investigation_date DATE,
  findings TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Investigations (
	investigation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	complaint_id INT,
	investigator_id INT,
	investigation_notes TEXT,
	investigation_date DATE
);
